title: Unstable ping in game caused by router
body:
Hi, 
I recently changed my wifi adapter since i lost my old one. I got all the drivers, but for some reason, the traffic pc-router isnt that great... 
Is this problem caused by my wifi adapter of my router? 
Thank you in advance!
Best luck on the Rift!

image for the cmd gui
http://imgur.com/a/JkiyR

replies.body: I'm not getting a lot out of that image.  We can get a more in-depth traceroute through [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/).  Download that and run a route to 104.160.131.1.  In general, bad hardware or an unstable connection can certainly cause some trouble so you're likely to see that well before you start hopping around through a traceroute.  For this reason, your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot any local problems that might cause you issues with our game servers.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Ok! ill look into it when i get some free time. thanks a lot!! :)
